original_text: If it was torn to pieces by a wild animal, the neighbor shall bring in the remains as evidence and shall not be required to pay for the torn animal.
korean_text: 만일 찢겼으면 그것을 가져다가 증언할 것이요 그 찢긴 것에 대하여 배상하지 아니할지니라

sentences.original_text: If it was torn to pieces by a wild animal,
the neighbor shall bring in the remains as evidence
sentences.korean_translation: 이웃은 남은 부분을 증거로 가져와야 하며

sentences.original_text: and shall not be required to pay for the torn animal.
sentences.korean_translation: 찢겨진 동물에 대해 지불할 필요가 없을 것입니다.
